# At time of writing, LLDB knowingly leaks python resources due
# to invalid assumptions.
#
# So suppress leaks coming from libpython. Long term we need to
# find a way to deal with LLDB behaving so poorly.
#
# See: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/blob/2eabcb73c/lldb/source/Plugins/ScriptInterpreter/Python/ScriptInterpreterPython.cpp#L3170-L3184
leak:libpython
